projects.title: Algorithm Arena
projects.description: Built frontend/backend for a competitive programming web app using React, MaterialUI, AWS, and MongoDB. Has over 20 leetcode style questions that are evaluated in real time using 100+ test cases.

projects.title: Scheme Interpreter
projects.description: Simple interpreter for the Scheme programming language, written in C. Provides basic functionality for parsing and evaluating of Scheme expressions.

projects.title: Natural Disaster Archive Viewer
projects.description: Database-driven website that allows users to visualize trends in U.S. natural disasters since 1953.
